settings.headline: Your trusted pros for HVAC, plumbing, and electrical in [City]
settings.subheadline: Licensed, bonded, and insured contractors delivering rapid response and award-winning craftsmanship for homes and businesses across [Region].

settings.heading: Full-service solutions under one roof
settings.subheading: From emergency outages to full system upgrades, our certified teams handle every trade with precision.

services.name: HVAC Install & Repair
services.description: High-efficiency heating and cooling design, installation, and maintenance for residential and commercial properties.

services.name: Plumbing & Sewer
services.description: Whole-home repipes, tankless water heaters, leak detection, and hydro-jetting backed by clean workspace guarantees.

services.name: Electrical Upgrades
services.description: Panel replacements, EV charging stations, lighting design, and code compliance handled by master electricians.

services.name: Roofing & Exterior
services.description: Storm damage assessments, shingle and metal roofing, gutters, and weatherproofing with lifetime workmanship warranty.

services.name: Safety & Compliance
services.description: Fire alarms, backup generators, smart-home monitoring, and OSHA-compliant safety programs for facilities.

services.name: Facility Maintenance
services.description: Proactive service plans with dedicated account managers, quarterly reporting, and priority dispatch for property managers.

settings.heading: See the difference
settings.subheading: From emergency recoveries to full-scale remodels, every project is managed with precision and pride.

projects.title: Data center electrical retrofit
projects.description: Upgraded the main service, installed redundant generators, and brought all wiring to current NFPA standards in <6 weeks.

projects.title: Historic home plumbing repipe
projects.description: Copper to PEX conversion, tankless water heater, and fixture refresh - completed without opening original plaster walls.

projects.title: Emergency grocery store reopening
projects.description: Pipe burst mitigation, electrical dry-out, refrigeration restart, and interior restoration - store reopened in 72 hours.

projects.title: Multifamily HVAC modernization
projects.description: Installed VRF system with smart zoning, reducing tenant utility spend by 23% year-over-year.

settings.heading: Serving [City] and the surrounding metro

cta.label: Not sure if we serve you? Call us!

items.question: Are you licensed and insured?
items.answer: Yes - every trade is fully licensed in the state of [State], backed by $4M liability, workers comp, and bonding.

items.question: Do you offer emergency services?
items.answer: Our rapid response team is on call 24/7 with an average arrival time of 60 minutes within our core service area.

items.question: What warranties do you provide?
items.answer: Standard workmanship is covered for 2 years, with up to 10-year coverage on premium systems. Manufacturer warranties are registered on your behalf.

items.question: Can you help with financing?
items.answer: Yes - we partner with Synchrony, GreenSky, and Wells Fargo to offer 0% introductory financing and flexible monthly plans.

items.question: Do you pull permits and handle inspections?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our team coordinates permitting, code compliance, and inspector walk-throughs for every project.

items.question: How quickly can you start?
items.answer: Emergency jobs start immediately. Planned projects typically begin within 3-5 business days after approval, or on your preferred schedule.

items.question: Do you provide free estimates?
items.answer: Yes - site visits and written proposals are complimentary. For complex engineering scopes we credit design fees toward the final project.

items.question: Do you work with commercial facilities?
items.answer: We service medical offices, retail, data centers, multifamily, and industrial spaces with tailored maintenance programs.
